name: Clangd LSP
description: C/C++ language server (clangd) for Claude Code, providing code intelligence, diagnostics, and formatting.
longDescription: Integrates `clangd` as a language server for C and C++ files (`.c`, `.h`, `.cpp`, `.cc`, `.cxx`, `.hpp`, `.hxx`). Provides go-to-definition, find references, diagnostics, and code formatting. Installable via `brew install llvm` (macOS), `apt install clangd` / `dnf install clang-tools-extra` / `pacman -S clang` (Linux), or LLVM releases (Windows).
